verses.verse: <S%H4910>"Dominion<s%> and <S%H6343>fear<s%> are with <S%H6213>him.<s%> He makes <S%H7965>peace<s%> in his high <S%H4791>places.<s%>
<S%H3426>Can<s%> his <S%H1416>armies<s%> be <S%H4557>counted?<s%> On whom does his <S%H216>light<s%> not <S%H6965>arise?<s%>
How then can <S%H582>man<s%> be <S%H6663>just<s%> with <S%H410>God?<s%> Or how can he who is <S%H3205>born<s%> of a <S%H802>woman<s%> be <S%H2135>clean?<s%>
<S%H3394>Behold,<s%> even the moon has no <S%H166>brightness,<s%> and the <S%H3556>stars<s%> are not <S%H2141>pure<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight;<s%>
How much less <S%H582>man,<s%> who is a <S%H7415>worm,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> who is a <S%H8438>worm!<s%>"
